description:
Set date sale. All offers presented by 6pm on the 7th February (unless sold prior)

If you're in search of the perfect first home or a great investment, then look no further. This renovated 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home has all the space you need and more. Wardrobes in all bedrooms plus a large linen cupboard in the hallway provides ample storage while the kitchen includes a gas stove and dishwasher.

The central bathroom and separate W/C have been totally renovated in line with current trends and includes a heated towel rail.

A bright internal lounge / meals area, adjacent the kitchen is complimented by an enclosed alfresco which is just waiting for you to entertain family and friends on those warm summer evenings or relax in the large backyard, on the deck, under the shade of backyard trees and grape vines or play in the large separate studio / games room.

Situated on a quiet street, moments away from Bridgeway Park and the Canning River, the convenience of both Carousel and Riverton Forum Shopping Centres are not far away while Kent St weir is accessible along the walking/cycle path.

Key features include:
• 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom
• Renovated throughout
• Easy care flooring throughout
• Alarm and security cameras
• Ducted air conditioning
• Separate studio / games room
• Large fenced backyard

This great property will not last so be quick, contact Logan Duncan-Smith or Ian Rowson today.

**Disclaimer: * The above information is provided for general information purposes only and may be subject to change. No warranty or representation is made as to the accuracy of the information and all interested parties should make their own independent enquiries relating to the information provided and place no reliance on it. Any chattels depicted or described in the information are not included in the sale unless specified in the Offer and Acceptance.
